comment._content:
Early Wright Model B  identified by "blinkers style".
"Second Annual International Aviation Meet" ,  Dominguez Aero Park 
December 24, 1910 - January 3, 1911  ( Los Angeles Herald Advertisement December 26, 1910)
Structures in background identify location as Dominguez   

" Famous Wright Trio"   Arch Hoxsey   Walter Brookins  Phil Parmalee 
Six machines ...   (Los Angeles Herald Advertisement  December 25, 1910)
